title: DHI Hair Transplant
description: Direct Hair Implantation (DHI) is a cutting-edge technique that allows for precise, individual hair follicle placement without the need for pre-made incisions.
benefits: Maximum control over hair direction and angle
risks: Mild discomfort during first few days
